title: Covid: PM to lead No 10 briefing as England schools return
content:
1. Covid: PM to lead No 10 briefing as England schools return  BBC News
  2. COVID-19: Schools reopen with mass testing as Boris presses ahead with lockdown plan  The Sun
  3. Vaccine passports will be a feature of our life for foreign travel, says PM  Yahoo News UK
  4. Live: Boris Johnson gives coronavirus briefing  The Independent
  5. English children head back to school after two months of home learning  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 科维德：英国学校回归，总理将率领10号简报。
科維德：英國學校迴歸，總理將率領10號簡報。
